# Resize

## Usage

For detailed instructions, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support     |
| ------------------- | ----------- |
| `resize-none`       | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `resize-y`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `resize-x`          | ğŸŒ Web only |
| `resize`            | ğŸŒ Web only |
